oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Receipt of items purchased by Uriah Denton
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Receipt of items bought from Abraham Case by Uriah Denton. Items listed include indigo, madder, knives and forks, calico, silk, wool hats, ridding comb, awl blades, tumblers, ribbons, skillet, crocks. Kelly's Ferry was on the Tennessee River near Armstrong, Tennessee in Meigs County.
